title: This factory game RTS uses programmable drones instead of conveyor belts
description: Desynced seeks to combine the base-building, factory management, and RTS genres.

title: Want some Final Fantasy in your Final Fantasy? The FF14 team wants to put old FF games in player housing
description: But they need some help. If you're an engineering wiz, Yoshida wants to talk.

title: There really is a game called Toilet Tycoon, and we played it
description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

title: Build a base to escape an alien world, all while browsing the internet in this quarter-screen idler
description: Deskape, stylized dEskape, is purpose-built to fit along a band at the bottom of your screen.

title: Remnant 2 attracts twice as many players as the first game
description: Remnant 2's user record on Steam is more than twice that of its predecessor.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #770: Saturday, July 29
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.
